channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Word of the Week: how a bacteria unrelated to fish got its name "salmonella"
item.description: Despite its fishy name, the bacteria salmonella has no connection to the underwater creature.
